name: apollo-graphql-challenge
description: Rest Mock and handling via Apollo

scripts.install:mock-dependancies: cd rest-mock && npm install --no-warning && echo "----- Installed Mock Dependancies -----"
scripts.install:server-dependancies: cd apollo-server && npm install --no-warning && echo "----- Installed Server Dependancies -----"
scripts.install:client-dependancies: cd apollo-client && npm install --no-warning && echo "----- Installed Client Dependancies -----"
scripts.postinstall: (npm run install:mock-dependancies); (npm run install:server-dependancies); (npm run install:client-dependancies);
